name: Powers of Two (2048)
description:
Simple, addictive, Zen-like puzzle game.

The rule: slide the numbers and get to the target tile. That's it! Enjoy!

Key features:

• Free to play
• Easy to learn
• Fun for all ages
• Three board sizes for quick and long games
• Appealing translucent design, relaxing to the eyes
• Optimized for iOS 8 and iPhone 6
• Supports all resolutions, including iPad retina
• Leaderboards to track your scores and times
